-- | Unicode characters
--   
@package opentheory-unicode
@version 1.140


module OpenTheory.Unicode
newtype Unicode
Unicode :: Natural -> Unicode
unUnicode :: Unicode -> Natural
destPlane :: Natural -> Natural
destPosition :: Natural -> Natural
invariant :: Natural -> Bool
plane :: Unicode -> Natural
position :: Unicode -> Natural
random :: Random -> Unicode
instance Eq Unicode
instance Ord Unicode
instance Show Unicode
instance Arbitrary Unicode


module OpenTheory.Unicode.UTF8
parseAscii :: Parser Byte Natural
isContinuationByte :: Byte -> Bool
parseMultibyte :: Parser Byte Natural
parseNatural :: Parser Byte Natural
parseUnicode :: Parser Byte Unicode
parse :: Parser Byte (Either Byte Unicode)
decode :: [Byte] -> [Either Byte Unicode]
encodeAscii :: Natural -> [Byte]
encodeUnicode :: Unicode -> [Byte]
encode :: [Unicode] -> [Byte]
reencodeUnicode :: Either Byte Unicode -> [Byte]
reencode :: [Either Byte Unicode] -> [Byte]
